title: Supernatural Damsels (feat. Andy Fiori, Jessica Kirson & Joe DeRosa)
description: Jay discusses the show Supernatural and its hunky stars with the crew and Andy Fiori. Jessica Kirson checks in with the crew and let’s us know how her quarantine is going. The gang asks the questions 'Is the cause of the coronavirus the new 5G network?' and 'Just how horny is every during the lockdown?' Dan and Jay discuss 21 Jump Street and the puzzling casting of Margot Kidder and Lois Lane in Superman II.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
